nodes.text: The Seinar Corporation was allied with Roganda Ismaren in 12 ABY. Its president and many of its executive board were Sullustans. Luke Skywalker used a proton blaster manufactured by Seinar on Nam Chorios in 13 ABY.

"Seinar" was presumably a misspelling of "Sienar"; however, there is no known "Sienar Corporation," and all of Sienar's projects were not run by Sullustans. However, Seinar Corporation is mentioned several times throughout the novel, and it is always spelled the same way.
